alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 16 at 1:32AM CST until February 16 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL NEWTON AND NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON COUNTIES... At 132 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Dillen to 7 miles north of Holman, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dillen... Cowell... Haw Creek Falls Campground... Deer... Fort Douglas... Mineral Springs Recreation Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
